entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
